title: What Does It Mean if Your Right Foot Itches?

steps.title: An itchy right foot indicates you’re embarking on a new journey.
steps.content: An itchy right foot indicates you’re embarking on a new journey. Traditionally, the right side of the body is the side of good fortune, and your feet are what you use to move. As a result, the most popular interpretation of an itchy right foot is a good omen that a fresh expedition is on the horizon for you. [1] X Research source This could be a physical trip, like a surprise vacation or a trip to a new area, or it could be a symbolic journey, like a new relationship. If you’ve been thinking about moving or changing jobs, an itchy right foot might be the sign you need to take the plunge. An itchy right foot is akin to “itching to go somewhere” or “itching for an adventure.” Some people say that an itchy right foot is uniquely bad for women. Frankly, we can’t find a lot of historical evidence supporting this idea, though.

steps.title: It could be that your itchy foot means luck is on your side.
steps.content: It could be that your itchy foot means luck is on your side. According to some folks, an itchy right foot is just a general sign that you’ve been blessed. You can expect some good fortune coming your way soon, or maybe whatever project you’re undertaking is going to turn out better than you could ever imagine! [2] X Research source If you’re religious, this might be a sign that your most recent prayers are going to be answered.

steps.title: In Christian traditions, an itchy foot may mean you’re blessed.
steps.content: In Christian traditions, an itchy foot may mean you’re blessed. Proverbs 4:26-27 says, “Ponder the path of your feet; then all your ways will be sure. Do not swerve to the right or to the left; turn your foot away from evil.” Since the lefthand path is typically viewed as the “wrong way,” an itchy right foot could be seen as a sign God is shining his light upon you. Take this as confirmation that you’re doing the right thing. [3] X Research source The Bible doesn’t say anything specifically about itching. Still, God works in mysterious ways, and if you feel like the itching is significant, it could be a sign!

steps.title: In Indian culture, an itchy right foot is a sign travel will be fruitless.
steps.content: In Indian culture, an itchy right foot is a sign travel will be fruitless. In certain Indian spiritual traditions, an itchy right foot isn’t a good sign if you’re a woman. It means that your current travels or journeys are unlikely to end favorably. [4] X Research source Perhaps a vacation isn’t going to be fulfilling, or maybe that trip you’re thinking about isn’t a great idea. If you’re in the middle of a big life change, keep your wits about you and be judicious.

steps.title: In Turkish tradition, right foot itching means you’re about to travel.
steps.content: In Turkish tradition, right foot itching means you’re about to travel. Whether you were planning on it or not, it’s time to pack your bags! In Turkey, an itching right foot means you’re about to hit the road. If you have been yearning for a break, you’ll be happy to know that you’re about to get one. [5] X Research source If you’ve been thinking about taking a trip or going to visit a family member but haven’t made up your mind about it, consider the matter settled!

steps.title: Don’t scratch or you may bring yourself bad luck!
steps.content: Don’t scratch or you may bring yourself bad luck! Most people will say that scratching an itchy right foot is a quick way to turn your fortunes upside down. If you think an itchy right foot is a generally good omen, lean into the feeling. Allow yourself to experience the sensation to receive the full omen from the universe. Your itch should go away in a minute or two. If it doesn’t, it’s a sign that your itchy foot isn’t…well, a sign. It’s likely you just have dry skin or a bug bite. Go ahead and scratch it. [6] X Trustworthy Source American Academy of Dermatology Professional organization made of over 20,000 certified dermatologists Go to source Other common reasons your foot might be itching include nerve irritation, eczema, athlete’s foot , or allergic reaction. [7] X Research source

steps.title: If your ankle itches you’re about to get paid.
steps.content: If your ankle itches you’re about to get paid. Good news! An itchy right ankle is a signal that your bank account is about to get some love. Perhaps you’re going to get a raise at work, or maybe you’ll get a job offer for more than you currently make. Maybe it’s a signal that you’re about to get an expensive gift or win the lottery .
